title: Disconnect problem
body:
hi guys , i have problem , everytime i got disconnect pvp.net server , i try everything but .. :( Before 1 week dont  have this problem when got 6.20 patch again got  "You have disconnected from PVP.Net. Attempting to restore your game upon reconnect...
Reconnected to PVP.Net

replies.body: It seems like your network is having trouble maintaining communication with chat, and it's important to get that fixed up in case you end up having connection issues in other areas of the game.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a resolution!  Let me know if you have any questions!
